resources.string: Where to find us:\n20 Dungeon Street, 12345 Easthaven

Welcome, dear traveller! 
We proudly present Faerûn´s first Role Playing Café… 
The home of Elves, Orcs, Dwarves and Trolls!
The place where you really can be all what you ever wanted to be…
Opening hours:\nTue - Fri: 3 p.m. - 11 p.m.\nSat - Sun: 3 p.m. - 1 a.m.
